instruction: Translate the following financial report to English.
output: The degree to which underperforming companies in the energy sector have dragged down performance decreased from the first half of this year to the third quarter. Amidst this situation, it is uncertain how each flagship index will fare by the end of this year. Various MSCI ACWI ESG indices have shown resilience in the past, but in the third quarter, a strong dollar and the exclusion of certain large companies weighed heavily on ESG indices' underperformance. Nevertheless, allocations to carbon-efficient companies within each sector continued to contribute to performance.
